alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cameron; Inland Cameron (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 4:48AM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cameron County through 515 AM CDT... At 447 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over South Point, or near Southmost, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port Of Brownsville, Brownsville, Port Isabel, Lopez High School, Villa Pancho, Southmost Elementary School, Port Isabel Lighthouse, Port Isabel High School, Port Isabel Fire And Police Department and Laguna Vista Police Department. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
